website_summaries.verdict: This playstand features multiple perch, play, and exercise areas to help birds get the most out of "free time.
pros: Perches, ladders, and a swing provide ample opportunity for exercise, play, and rest
Comes with 8 toy hooks and  food/water bowls
Wide seed guard keeps messes contained
Caster wheels make it easy to move from room to room
cons: Most birds gravitate toward the highest point and, unfortunately, the top toy bar is rather thin

customer_reviews.title: ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Well I gave it 4 star, we like it but as mention many many times before the top bar is to small. Other than that my grey loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Davis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect play gym!
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive about buying this product, but I’m so happy I did! My green cheek conure loves this play gym! We live in a row home and I wanted something that was easy to carry around the house. It’s light enough to carry up and down the stairs but still sturdy enough to hold up to being banged around and not get damaged. It’s versatile, you can decorate it however it suits your bird. I did not install the top bar or the wing flaps so that it is more compact and I wrapped macrame around the bars so my bird could walk on them easier. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Us

customer_reviews.title: Great perch
customer_reviews.text: I really like this perch. It keeps my African Gray from climbing all the way down to the floor. The reason for the 4 stars is because of where the food and water dishes are. I'm thinking who ever designed this must not know birds. They go to the very top to hang out, hence the poop goes to the bottom. I also think a better metal bar should be made for the top. Since that's where the birds go they have problems hanging on. Anyone that fixes these problems will have a not in stock sign out all the time. Also I put sisal rope all over the bars so he can climb and get around better.
customer_reviews.author: Deb04

customer_reviews.title: Happy Bird = Happy Owner
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the overall quality of the product. I wasn't expecting too much but it actually is a fairly nice bird stand. I took the advise of other reviewers to wrap a lot of the areas of the stand in cotton rope which made it much easier for my Cockatiel to get around on the cage. My only complaint would be the ladder rungs which are too small and my bird doesn't/can't use them. Overall, my bird really seems to like the stand and stays put on it for a while. So, I am very happy with this purchase and would recommend it to anyone with a medium size bird.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: African Grey figured this thing out in the first few minutes.
customer_reviews.text: My 34 year old Grey grabs onto the steel catch guard in the corner, swings down and gets hold of the leg and off he goes. I have the same problem with his cage which is designed for a large to medium sized parrot. The perch is large enough but they need to make the catch guards larger to keep birds on the cage or perch. I can really only use this for him when I'm in the same room and can tell him to stay on his perch. So if you have a parrot that's an escape artist this might not be the perch for you.
customer_reviews.author: Andreas Keppner

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The stand was easy to assemble, great value for the price, in wheels so easy to move around. Cons: The seed catcher took an hour yo assemble. Top play bar is too small and sleek for birds to grip on. Did have to add safe bird rope around it to be useable for birds. Purchased the Laege one for my cockatiels. I followed the reviews and added the ripe around the top part of the stand. The bars were very small before adding it and the birds couldn't get a grip on it. It was much more then I expected it to be and such a good value for the price. I would recommend it if youre considering it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: My Caique loved it, size perfect for my NY apt!
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome, should of got it sooner I admit. My Caique was curious enough as I was putting it together and he loved it. Wobbled over to helped me put it together. He was climbing and playing on it before I even had a chance to fully assemble the stand. Which wasn't difficult at all. However I am going to wrap the top bar since he tried climbing it and swung upside down like a crazed Olympian, to his and my suprise! Top bar is very slippery and narrow for his chubby eagle claws. We both laughed literally! At least he thought it was fun but definitely needs better grips, will be ordering rope.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and well packaged. Putting it together myself was not difficult, a little funny at points where a third hand would have been useful :), but not difficult. My African Grey loves it... and the HUGE PLUS for me, she cannot negotiate beyond the seed guard in order to climb to the floor and walk among three LARGE dogs (with big feet)... or get into trouble chewing on my desk legs. Hahahahahaha...whoo-hoo... I win... (um, fingers crossed and knock on wood). Yes, the dishes get pooed in, but I just rinse them out, and yes, some rope was needed around the thinner bars, but, hey, personalizing it was fun. We are very happy indeed!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gym at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: The narrow top bar is where my birb wanted to perch, though it is clearly only meant to hold toys and it just wasn't happening so I had to afix a rope that did not come with with gym. I wrapped all the other perches with vet wrap. Now he has a safe place to play that he knows is just for him. It's convenient to roll room to room. He's so much more calm because I can leave him out longer to play now. Price was great too! All parts were present and instructions were simple. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie H.

customer_reviews.title: Quaker loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My Quaker absolutely loves this bird stand. He cannot wait for me to come home from work and place him on it in the kitchen. It allows him to be around the family and interact with everyone. The only thing that would make it better would be if the feed cups were up higher so the cats couldn't get so close to him. I had to rig another feed cup up higher near the wooden dowel which I wrapped in hemp rope similar to other reviewers. Still a great product for a busy bird!
customer_reviews.author: Reads Til Dawn

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Great play stand!! Our bird (cockatiel) spends almost all of his day on it, and it definitely has held up well (almost two years old!). Easy to clean and awesome for hanging toys to keep them active. It's perfect for a smaller sized bird. Also easy to transport with the casters on the legs for those times your winged family members would like to join you outside on a nice sunny day. Two thumbs up here!! Don't keep them in a boring cage, it's really nice to have them out and about perching as they would in the wild.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Setup was easy, and with a little creativity
customer_reviews.text: After reading through the other Amazon reviews and seeing other users' photos, I saw the potential of this inexpensive perch. Setup was easy, and with a little creativity, you can turn it into an entertainment center for your small to medium sized parrot. My Illiger Macaw loves to play on this. Deck it out with rope perches, toys, and colorful vet wrap to make a magical parrot play-stand. Might want to go next size up for anything larger than an CAG. A bigger Macaw, or any bird with lengthy tail feathers, will need a little more space to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy overall - even with the mess
customer_reviews.text: A bit flimsy and too short to be ideal, but it's nice to have on wheels to move from room to room. The bowls and all the parts below are much too easy targets for the poo cannon. Almost anyone with birds will know that they prefer higher places unless they are exploring. Therefore, this requires much more frequent cleaning of the lower bars, ladders, and especially the food/water bowls. This is a favorite hangout for My Double Yellow-headed Amazon Parrot, so I'm happy overall - even with the mess.
customer_reviews.author: Mistress Y.

customer_reviews.title: Happy birds with minor adjustment
customer_reviews.text: Our birds love it. For the price, it is a great buy. We had one nut that was not threaded so we couldn't use it and a few dings on the bottom pan, but it is functional and the cockatiels are happy. We did follow the suggestion to wrap 1/4 inch sisal cord on the top so the birds could perch up there as is their natural instinct to go to the highest perch.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: My cockatiel and I love it !
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect playground for my cockatiel. From opening the box to fully assembling it took me about an hour. I did wrap most of the surface where my bird would stand or climb with veterinarian tape (another 30 to 45 minutes)as the metal would be too difficult for a bird to grip. The water and food bowls are set away from the areas where my birds spends the most time, so getting poop in the bowls has not been an issue. The price is good, it's easy to assemble and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: I love it, they love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase. The stand was relatively simple to put together and is very sturdy. My birds love it. My only real issue is the places where the toys go seem to be made for large toys so this might not be great for small birds. As you can see, some of my birds' toys are a little too small for them to reach. But, I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler marrs

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I will admit that there are some design flaws with this play stand that others have mentioned, such as the placement of the food and water cups at the bottom of the stand rather than at the top and the thin perch at the top. However, for the price this is a very good deal. The stand is sturdy and larger than I anticipated. I've enjoyed looking at the pictures here showing the many ways other buyers have customized the stand for their birds. I'm looking forward to making a few modifications myself. The stand took me around 1.5 hours to assemble, and the directions were easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: I was both pleased and disappointed with this product. While it is big enough for a parrot (African Grey, in my case) it is not designed for a parrot. The design is for a smaller bird (any small bird up to a cockatiel). My bird is relatively young (only 20) and in very good health, but had problems getting from the 'latters' to the top perch. Not to mention, the wood perches should be a little more rough for easy grasping, but that is a easy fix. What I was pleased about was is the size...its perfect for smaller places and would be just fine for my bird if only it was designed more with a parrot in mind.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Lovely playstand (with some minor tweaking)!
customer_reviews.text: This playstand is awesome! I'd say it was perfect but as stated by others, I had to wrap the bars for an easier grip. For this I used a thick, unoiled hemp rope and a couple dabs from the hot glue gun. It turned out lovely with these modifications! (See pics) I also decided against attaching the food/water dishes. The positioning of them at the bottom is horrible. >.< Overall, I know my Caique is going to enjoy playing on this so I think it deserves 5 stars. ^.^
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Playstand for smaller birds
customer_reviews.text: I got this for 3 conures & a black headed caique. They love it. Perfect size for them. My African Grey sits in one spot and my severe mini macaw is a little too big for it but will sit on it for awhile. I bought a lot of toys from amazon to fill the spaces and Super Soft 3 Strand Twisted Cotton Rope - Multiple Colors to Choose from in Various Diameters and Lengths Sold by: OutdoorBunker to make it a little easier to climb around on so it's not so smooth & slippery. Pics will show everything.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Alexandrine!
customer_reviews.text: I have an Alexandrine who loves watching my family while we're in the kitchen/living area (her main cage is in my office so she can hang out while I work). We got this for her to hang out while we're cooking/watching TV and she seems to enjoy it. There are lots of places for toys and for her to roam around. She really likes climbing up the skinny top metal rail and using it as a perch. The seed catcher works pretty well to contain a lot of her mess when she's shredding toys. This is a very nice alternative to those very expensive (but awesome) java wood perches.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Play Stand for Cockatiels
customer_reviews.text: This is a great play stand for our cockatiel, Yuno. She loves it. It was easy to assemble and all the pieces were in good shape. She loves the height that it gives her and it’s always her goal to get to the top. Like others I plan on adding rope (pet friendly) on the top bar and around the two ladders. The bendable rope perches work very well with this play stand . I plan on buying a few more For the play stand. I would recommend this for anyone that likes to have their bird friends around them.
customer_reviews.author: Diana J. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Green cheek loves this stand!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to reading other reviews, I modified this to make it a fully equipped play stand that my bird loves! I wrapped sissle rope around top bar, added toys with lots of bells, moved food bowls up by using zip ties to attach food bowl holders, and added a rope to get to and from bowls easily. Now he spends hrs at a time with me in the kitchen! This worked out exactly as hoped! It's pretty easy to clean and moves around easily when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Green cheeks love it
customer_reviews.text: Just like the picture. Love this thing so much. I would recommend putting some vet wrap or something all around the thin metal bits just to add some grip for the birds. But other than that it’s so nice to have in another room so the birds can come with and join too. Would recommend for a small to medium size bird
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough
customer_reviews.text: It was easy enough to put together.. My wife and kids did it when the shipment arrived. My daughters bird loves it.. She was a little intimidated until we put a couple of her old toys on it. (We bought a bunch of new toys and she would fly off the stand.) Now the parrot loves being on it. We bought it so she would have stuff to do in other parts of the house.. Keeps her off the floor tempting my cats.. lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. It was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It was easy to assemble, it's light weight and my Quaker would rather be this stand then his cage top perch. I don't think the feed cups should be at the bottom though, but we will see how bad the expensive food I buy is wasted due to perching and pooping.
customer_reviews.author: talia renee

customer_reviews.title: Cute Playground with lots of options
customer_reviews.text: Good deal, easy to assemble, only took my husband about 45 minutes while watching TV. Like others we also wrapped the metal to make it easier for gripping. Everything on here was also purchased through Amazon. There are a lot of options to personalize this playground for your pet.
customer_reviews.author: Tarise

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep your bird busy and easy to move so your bird can be with you instead of always on you!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend as an alternative for your birds playtime...our Sun Conure loves it he can be wherever we are and not stuck in his cage. We purchased additional toys to hang on this and he climbs all over it. Very sturdy and mobile! Reasonable price compared to some of the "Fabricated trees for birds"
customer_reviews.author: Jill D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My parrotlets LOVE this play stand. They play on it all day long. It was easy to put together, though it took a little while. Very sturdy and the wheels make it super easy to move around the room. The only problem I had was the bars are a little slick and awkward for their little feet to grab. I just wrapped some fabric around the bars and problem fixed! No issues since I wrapped the fabric around them.
customer_reviews.author: Juels

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend getting this product for anything larger than a small ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bird stand and my cockatiel is really enjoying it so far. However, it is smaller and lower quality than I had expected. Putting it together was a struggle at times as some of the metal was not completely punched out and some pieces were warped. For $50 you can't go wrong with this stand if you're just starting out. However, I wouldn't recommend getting this product for anything larger than a small conure or cockatiel.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchel Burnell

customer_reviews.title: I think it's much better to have her out on the stand than have ...
customer_reviews.text: Our Hans Macaw loves her new play stand!!! I think it's much better to have her out on the stand than have her out on her cage! She loves climbing all around the stand and then perching on top. As for the top metal perch... I agree with some other comments about the flimsiness of the metal perch at the top. I wrapped it with sisal rope and it now provides much more stability and better footing for the bird! So, in my humble opinion, I believe this to be a quality stand if you make a minor addition to the top perch area!
customer_reviews.author: Paul K

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and bird loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My parakeet LOVED this! She is so spoiled and doesn't like to be kept in a cage, so she was super happy getting to observe all that was going on around her (including monitoring me when I worked from home as in this video LOL). Very simple and easy to assemble, comes with basic tools to tighten the screws and such. Sturdy and looks great. Was a little slippery for my parakeet's tiny feet so all I did was attach sandpaper perches for her grip. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Birds are Happy with this!
customer_reviews.text: This play stand is for a Senegal & a cockatiel. Their big cages are in the kitchen while this stand is in my husband's 'man cave' so the 2 birds can spend time with "Dad" without climbing all over him...!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lu H.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. The only time my bird is in his cage is when I'm not home. I can keep him out all day with this item. It's been easy to clean and move around. Easy to put together. I had my kids put it together and I just watched too make sure it was done right. Lol good times. Thinking about getting one more for upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: DoubleRope

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST VERSATILE STAND!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely would recommend this stand to EVERYONE!!! I had looked at all the pictures others had posted before I purchased and couldn't wait to use this stand to create something Awesome and Fun Filled for my Green Cheek Conure! This stand is just perfect for a base to work off of with such a great design for creating so much fun!!! This stand is Sturdy and Easy to put together additionally, impressed all around.
customer_reviews.author: Patty L.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stand
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a secondary stand for my African Greys to use even though it says for smaller birds. My girl loves this thing, my boy HATES it lol. He hates everything new though, so I don't blame the stand. It was pretty easy to put together and it moves around nicely on the hardwood floors. My only complaint is that I wish the food dishes were up top because every time she's on the upper perch she ends up pooping in the water dish.
customer_reviews.author: Madhatter

customer_reviews.title: If you have a parrot, you NEED this
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing for the price. I would’ve paid $200 for something just as good. It took around 2 hours to put together, I timed myself, how ppl managed to put this together in 20 minutes I do not know. After I gave this to my fletcher he hopped up on my hand and started to preen my face, I could tell he was thankful. This is super sturdy and the instructions were super easy to follow compared to all the cages I have bought. My budgies and Linnie love this too.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a conure
customer_reviews.text: Great size. Stands almost 6 feet tall. Super easy to clean. Only problem is if the bird doesn't use the specified perches they may occasionally poop in their food or water. Definitely recommend wrapping the top perch in some sort of natural fiber rope so their little feet can find more purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Mallon IV

customer_reviews.title: Conure approved
customer_reviews.text: This play gym was affordable, easy to set up, sturdy, and my green cheek conures love it. I'm pleased with this product, but it has a small design flaw. Birds like to use the highest available perch. My birds sit on the top wire and constantly flap their wings to avoid slipping off. I'm going to twine some rope around the top wire to fix the problem. If the top wire had a wood perch in its place, this play gym would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly F.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a fairly uneducated female when it comes to tools and putting things like this together. That being said I was able to do it in a reasonable amount of time. It fits both my Sunday conure and blue fronted Amazon. Great price, good size, easy to move. I am extremely pleased with this product. Oh and lightening fast shipping to rural Alaska! I bought the medium sized one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Westerlund

customer_reviews.title: Great for Conures
customer_reviews.text: I had previously had one of those little wooden playgrounds that I had to move all around the house when I brought my conure out. This is absolutely perfect. I can roll it easily to any room I'm in. She loves playing on it. As others have said, the top bar should have been made thicker for perching. I also love that I can stock food and water for her easily and clean up is so easy! My only problem that I couldn't get the black panels to line up properly to be screwed in, but I just duct taped them. No big deal to me.
customer_reviews.author: YunieTheOracle

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Wondering if this product is worth the money for your birds? It is! I don't regret it a bit. Usually i'm pretty cheap but I am so glad i bought it.It took my husband 15 minutes to put it together. My sun conure and cherryhead conure both enjoy the stand--it seems to be a good size for them and easy to clean. I added a bunch of toys and extra rope perches to make it more exciting. Very sturdy and overall a good value. go for it!
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I wheel this all over the place ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I wheel this all over the place so my parrot can hang out with me. The toy hooks are really nice to have and cleaning is a breeze. My only two suggestions to Prevue are... 1. If the tray in the bottom was a perfect square on the inside it would make it easier to place liners into. 2. My parrot loves to land on the very top... if you could make the diameter of that bar a little wider or turn it into another perch (a different diameter perch for variety) it would be great. Overall I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mark D

customer_reviews.title: Good Size, sturdy, easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: This model actually has a better design with the poop problem on the larger one. This playstand is not too small for a medium sized parrot. It's actually probably just the right size, unless your bird needs the extra room. I could see putting a couple of Conures up on this for them to live together... for ref, I have a Yellow Naped Amazon Parrot, he uses this pe3rch when we go to my girlfriend's parents house for the weekend. He likes the change of it, keeps him active with new stuff moire often. I think it works, but he's probably like, why can't you just leave my stuff alone! hahahaha! Good stand play perch! Great quality, great durable finish!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: I bought this playstand for my two love birds (agapornis roseicollis)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this playstand for my two love birds (agapornis roseicollis), and although it's meant for bigger birds, they love it. At first they only used the top portion (that I had to tie around with rope like in other reviews), but now they even use the feeding bowls on the bottom and the swing. It's incredibly convenient because it reduces the amount of cleaning that has to be done when we let them out. We have not and will not clip their wings, so they still fly all over our living room but they spend 80% of the time on the playstand.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Enrique Luzardo Osorio

customer_reviews.title: Very small and slippery
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Cockatiel to use downstairs when she was away from her cage, but I am disappointed as to how small this was and she couldn't climb around on it because all the bars are slick and steep. I tried putting medical tape on the bars so she could grip it, but she still had trouble. Also the wood sticks in the middle by the food and water containers roll and aren't stable. My cockatiel hated this playstand and wont go anywhere near it. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kritzberg

customer_reviews.title: My bird calls the shots 🙄
customer_reviews.text: If you own a bird and you’re living in a space larger than a tent, you should get this. I wheel my bird into whatever room I’m in so he doesn’t lose his mind yelling at me for ignoring him. He’s like my boss.
customer_reviews.author: Joemama

customer_reviews.title: Birdy loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and very easy to roll from room to room. The only thing I didn't like is the shallow stainless steel bowls. I wish they were a little deeper. Overall it's a great play gym.
customer_reviews.author: JMM

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy stand, my conures love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very study. Easy to put together. Only wish at the very top where the toys hang there was an added perch. I was able to create one myself. My birds like to perch at the very top so adding the perch made them happy and is easier on their feet.
customer_reviews.author: CIN

customer_reviews.title: shipping was super fast! Came in 2 days and I chose ...
customer_reviews.text: It would be a 5 if idiots in quality control had caught the idiots in assembly. The top wood perch was not completely screwed in to keep it still. ...wouldn't be a problem had they not stripped out the screw head. I managed with pliers to tighten as much as I could, then had to apoxy it to keep from spinning. Other than that...shipping was super fast! Came in 2 days and I chose free slow shipping. Assembly was a breeze, super easy. I really love it and so do my birds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but not practical for parrots
customer_reviews.text: The perches are too small for a larger birds feet to grasp. My Senegal parrot tried to play on it but she couldn't maneuver comfortably and now won't go near it. If the perch areas were larger, I think this would be a great bird playground. Maybe good for parakeets or other birds with small feet?
customer_reviews.author: justme12418

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little playstand
customer_reviews.text: Assembled very quickly and we wrapped the top bar in rope for our little conure after really appreciating the suggestion from other reviewers. Our little conure just loves this! She watched the whole time it was being put together and even said "Thank you" as soon as we put her on it. She has a little difficult time getting from the ladder onto the wood bar but we will likely have to figure a way around that, but she spends most of her time at the top anyways.
customer_reviews.author: NinjaCupcake

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise very sturdy, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two. One for my African Grey and the other for Goffins Cockatoo. I removed the top bar with toy loops. It would be more ideal for cockatiels and smaller birds, but otherwise very sturdy, easy to clean, easy to assemble. The cockatoo chewed through the top wooden dowel but that's just cockatoos.
customer_reviews.author: CRTbird

customer_reviews.title: Screw holes
customer_reviews.text: A couple of the screw holes were not drilled all the way through. Disappointing for the money it cost. I did manage to get it put together even with that problem.. time will tell if it stays together.
customer_reviews.author: Diane McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: and a cockatiel) and they all love this stand
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 birds (nanday conure, green cheek conure, budgie, and a cockatiel) and they all love this stand. It was delivered in the time stated and was also easy to assemble. I would definitely recommend this to anyone with small to medium sized birds, they will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: ... due to the description it said it would be good for medium to large birds
customer_reviews.text: I bought this due to the description it said it would be good for medium to large birds. I have a Blue & Gold Macaw and this is just a little to small for her. It works but she needs it just a little bit bigger for her claws. Not great for a large breed bird I would say this is good for a small bird or maybe birds based on how small and how many you have.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Howard

customer_reviews.title: My birds seem to like it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this play structure for our Sun Conure and Cockatiel. They both will sit on it and play with their toys. The stand has multiple locations to hang toys from which they love. I change the position of the toys so they think its something different to explore. The only modification I made was to add rope around the metal parts. The birds like to climb on things to explore but were not able to climb up or down the metal arms on the top. Since adding the rope they are more willing to stay and play longer.
customer_reviews.author: Every1loveswhitlock

customer_reviews.title: Boring on its own... better when customized
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stand for my parrotlet. Honestly, on its own he would never have wanted to use it, but I was able to customize it with lots of perches and ropes. Now it looks more like the Swiss Family Treehouse and he's a fan!
customer_reviews.author: FlorS

customer_reviews.title: The worst design possible
customer_reviews.text: Extremely poor design. The perch is right over water and food bowl. As a result there is alway poop in his bowls. There are gaps in the side rails so we have to keep pads on the floor to catch poop that goes through. It came disassembled so sending it back would be a monumental task.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Pospisil

customer_reviews.title: my parrot LOVED it. This WILL take you about two hours ...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I cannot give this five stars is because of manufacturing errors. I had to get creative when putting this together, as the pieces didn't fit properly. However, once I figured out how to make everything work, my parrot LOVED it. This WILL take you about two hours to complete if there are manufacturing errors, and it would be wise to have someone help you
customer_reviews.author: clifton kubiak

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bird play pen
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bird playpen that I have brought for my two birds. The last one was the first model, which was smaller. This cage is so much bigger, different layout that made all the difference. I have two birds that loves this playpen. This is a must buy if you have birds. See photos for details.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn & Brad Siegel

customer_reviews.title: My flock loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This is day one, every member of my flock voluntarily jumped on this thing, I will be taking the advice of previous purchasers to make some modifications to make it more comfortable for my birds, assembly was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too happy about this playstand!
customer_reviews.text: Good Product; however, it seems to lean crooked a bit. Maybe it was just the builders! My first review is posted above; however, since having this playstand for several months now I'm realizing things that I'm not happy with. The positioning of the pieces above that the bird sits on all day are directly above his water and food bowls causing him to poop in them regularly. This should have been designed so this would not happen.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette from Little Rock

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: This is used for an African Gray. Great space saver. It is light weight and easy to clean because I can carry it outside and spray it off with the hose. But...the tray at the bottom had a small crack when we got it, it is very flimsy and may not last long. I tried to contact the seller to get a new one since I didn't break it and got no response
customer_reviews.author: jjacobs

customer_reviews.title: the bird gym itself is very nice..
customer_reviews.text: the bird gym itself is very nice... you really need 4 hands to assemble it, but it wasn't difficult. the seed skirt however is too big and doesn't fit after assembled. there are large gaps between the skirt and the tray base of the gym. we bent them so the tabs would fit but couldn't get all of the screws in so we gave up and bent them and wired the holes
customer_reviews.author: M. Werner

customer_reviews.title: He seems very happy. I put a swing on it and toys ...
customer_reviews.text: Duncan my Blue Crown Conure is very cage aggressive so this stand will be his home. He seems very happy. I put a swing on it and toys and he climbs all around. He even climbs up the narrow wire and then sits up on top and eats his cracker balancing on one foot. Was easy to put together with my dads help and easy to roll from room to room. The tray in the bottom is plastic not metal but I have an older cage from the same company with plastic and it is still fine not brittle.
customer_reviews.author: CAG

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad for the Cost
customer_reviews.text: Not too sturdy, but it was pretty cheap. My bird wouldn't eat or drink out of the food trays until we relocated them up at the top perch, and she really doesn't play on this stand at all, but she hangs out with me in my office and I guess that's going to have to do. I definitely prefer the Avian Adventures products (and so does she), but that's at least twice the expense. So we've got two Avian Adventures playstands and one by Prevue Pet Products. I'm ok with that for now.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F.

customer_reviews.title: Feet hazard for medium parrots
customer_reviews.text: Feels super flimsy and guards around the stand are easily picked up. Many places on this stand will pinch medium parrot feet. No idea why feeding cups are so low. Poop catchers. Needs a design over haul. Wheels roll well. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: TomlinStar

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction and good powered coating
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased as replacements for Parrot Towers. Unfortunately, they were not satisfactory for our use. Pros: Solid construction and good powered coating, easily moveable. Cons: Very poorly designed. Our birds would not use the cups since they were placed at the base and not top. Also, perches over cups resulted in them getting contaminated with feces. The toy holder encouraged our birds to try and sit at the top of it, which was difficult as it is small diameter and they had to cling very tight and would get tired.
customer_reviews.author: ecodon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality playstand!
customer_reviews.text: We are very satisfied with this product - we use it in the bathroom so the birds can be in there when we shower, etc. We did cover some of the metal surfaces with clothesline cord so it is more comfortable for them, but this isn't a necessity. Easy to assemble, good quality. Excellent product - I would buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Indian ringneck
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was taller but I am so happy I got this.My Louie loves it:) he was scared at first but now he is on it and trying to talk and is very happy with it😁
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo and Jacklyn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and sturdy cage.  A little pricey for me.
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT quality cage and will last for forever. There bars are super strong, the cage is roomy. My main complaint is the price is up there. For medium parrots cheaper cages are fine. If you have a big parrot you do need to have a good quality cage so this would be the preferred brand.
customer_reviews.author: lorimartow

customer_reviews.title: Great stand for keeping the mess down
customer_reviews.text: Excellent seed collector to keep down the mess. My bird likes the ladders but mostly goes to the top toy holding bar so like others I wrapped in thicker rope. The food/water bowls on the bottom keep the mess down but then often get pooped on so a bit of a tradeoff which I think they made correctly. Overall very pleased Note that it required about an hour of assembly while watching TV...
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, easy, sturdy..cockatiels, african grey. Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to assemble, good quality materials too. Comes with the Allen key, so no worry about needing any tools! Simple easy instructions, took about 30 minutes, with a toddler helping and running off with parts! I'll use it for cockatiels and african grey. Love how you can add or rotate toys. Nicely made, not too big, but not small and flimsy either.
customer_reviews.author: Hotkjen

customer_reviews.title: He likes it and has actually been happy staying on it
customer_reviews.text: This was for my small/medium U2. We have a small space right now so I didn't want to get the larger stand. I wanted a way to bring him upstairs to hang out in my room as the cage is downstairs. He likes it and has actually been happy staying on it. I did like another person suggested and wrapped the top piece in grass rope. BTW-- this was simple to put together. Had good instructions and took my hubby 30 min.
customer_reviews.author: RN4IttyBits

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our Ring neck
customer_reviews.text: We have this cage stand in our living room and our ring neck loves it. Easy to clean and so sturdy. We made a great purchase and I know our ring neck thinks the same lol.
customer_reviews.author: Tjay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent well made product
customer_reviews.text: My Amazon tends to wander so I bought this to keep her off the floor. She actually took to it right away. I would have given it a 4 1/2 if available. Very well made and sturdy. The only drawbacks are; the size of the small bolts that are really tiny impossible to hold with out pliers and it does take 2 to get the seed shield together. As another person noted, if using for larger birds than cockatiels the top wire is too small and I did wrap with cotton clothesline to make it usable for her to perch.
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: I love this play stand
customer_reviews.text: I love this play stand. It was easy to put together and provides daily fun for my Caique Parrot Olive. For the price it’s a great product but prepare to buy sisal rope and perch covers and lots of toys. It definitely needs sisal rope for ease of climbing but if it came already wrapped it would cost a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L. Windrich

customer_reviews.title: Listen to the reviews - great playstand! Even better with sisal rope!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stand as well as the highly-recommended sisal rope to enhance the top bar as a perch. I love it! Even without wrapping the top with sisal rope, my bird has a bridge toy that goes perfectly from one outside loop to the other. This is the perfect size playstand with so many ladders and climbing areas in all different directions. I'm sure this will keep my bird occupied and happy!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: The product is sturdy, but the bars are to smooth
customer_reviews.text: The product is sturdy, but the bars are to smooth. My conur had a hard time climbing and hanging on. I tied a bunch of hemp rope around the bars to give him more grip. That rope Worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda vicker

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality, Seed Guard Too Big
customer_reviews.text: This would have been five stars but the seed guard was about an inch too big!! We couldn't use it, which is a definite flaw. Other than that, it was not difficult to put together and works well for our Eclectus. I used vet wrap around the steps and very top wire. All of the places to hang toys is a great feature. It seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: SARA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my green cheek
customer_reviews.text: My bird loves to play on this! She loves to hang upside down, climb all over. I live the angle of the tray ...keeps nearly all her mess inside.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Booker

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! Great price for a great stand! As you can see in the last two pics I added vet wrap. My birds really got around just fine on it without it, but I just thought it would be more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Zensky

customer_reviews.title: The bird gym is fantastic for my amazon parrot
customer_reviews.text: The bird gym is fantastic for my amazon parrot. He hangs there in the evening, and then I wheel him and it into the bedroom when it's time to sleep. It's easy to clean and move. There are many hooks for hanging toys. I find that it's good for feeding fresh food because the debris is easier to clean than when he is fed the fresh food at his large cage, which will occasionally attract ants. Pluto loves the bird gym, and gets excited and perky when I say, "Want to go to the bird gym!?"
customer_reviews.author: Robert Verne Chesbro

customer_reviews.title: Missing bottom shelf
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t figure out how to contact the seller. This item was delivered today but is missing the bottom shelf with hooks. The assembly instructions were missing too but we figured out how to put it together. Would really like the bottom shelf...
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth81

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good. Size is not overwhelming. Easy to adapt to your bird.
customer_reviews.text: Made well. String enough for a med to med large bird. I am using it for green cheeks do I changed the long 1 inch diameter perch for a 3/4 inch diameter. Easy to do. Also added plastic chain and toys. It’s a nice size play gym. Not too big. You can leave off the top bar if you like. I kept it on.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M Gasperin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my caique!
customer_reviews.text: Took less than an hour to assemble and my caique loves it! This is the perfect size for a small to medium bird.
customer_reviews.author: Kpow2630

customer_reviews.title: Great for medium to large birds!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for the price!! Most of these cost 3x the amount yet are so small! Perfect for my cockatiel and conure, although they have trouble getting from the ladders to the wood perch. Definitely for medium to large birds.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: After doing a lot of research I found this playstand. Looking trough the pictures and reviews saw few recommendations, I made a few minor changes and it came out perfect! I replaced the top perch and didn’t install the thin toy hanger. You can add ropes and toys and lots of fun items for your bird. I wouldn’t put anything heavy on the bottom rack or it will bend but overall I’m really pleased with this purchase. So we’re ready to welcome our new green cheek conure. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Georgina Perez

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: This would be a decent play stand if the food and water cups weren't at the bottom. I stopped using this altogether and just bought a different stand for my birds because the cups were constantly getting pooped in.
customer_reviews.author: M.W.

customer_reviews.title: Birds Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I love this play gym and my birds love it also (or they love the toys I added.) I assembled it in less than 30 minutes. Decent quality and arrived in a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna DeCicco

customer_reviews.title: Indian ringneck approved! See video for sizing
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast! I’m extremely happy with it and so is our Indian ringneck. Packaging was perfect. I added a few modifications and plan on adding more, I added pictures of my dollar store forging basket that fit perfectly in the middle. It was exactly what I expected but better Quality. No imperfections with corners of seed guard or welding issues. Wheels move easily over carpet and it is NOT top heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Soderman

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I like the cage but my bird didn't seem to like it. He will go on the top 2 bars if you put him on it but he won't go on the cage by himself. Some of the parts didn't want to go together very easily so I had to have my husband crank on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Birds Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Own a Jenday conure and three budgies, everyone loves the playstand! Great deal compared to many other playstands!
customer_reviews.author: Jeneffer Cockrell

customer_reviews.title: Great value, my green cheeks love it
customer_reviews.text: My two green cheek conures love playing on their stand. It adds a lot of enjoyment to their out of cage time.
customer_reviews.author: Confused Middle-aged White Male

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great stand, looks nice and was easy to put together. Our cockatiel could not get from the ladders to the top perch so we tied a rope across underneath the perch to give him something to hold onto, he also likes to climb up onto the toy hangar so we will be wrapping it in rope like others have suggested. For the price it is a nice playstand and would be fine for multiple birds or larger parrots as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine R.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well, best to get a rope it you have a smaller bird like a cockatiel (my cockatiel cannot reach perch from the ladder) I bought some 100% cotton for the top but my bird doesn’t even go up there so it wasn’t needed
customer_reviews.author: Alexia Melms

customer_reviews.title: Love love LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice product!! Was very easy to put together. Its verysturdy and well made. It looks perfect with my cage and Im sure my GCC will have hours of fun on it!
customer_reviews.author: C & D Delacruz

customer_reviews.title: Happy parrots
customer_reviews.text: Best playstand I've ever had. I have a conure, a grey and an Amazon, and they all love it and use every feature 🙂
customer_reviews.author: John Lawton

customer_reviews.title: Playstand totally worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Rio, my Amazon parrot enjoys his new gym. It is easy to keep clean, was not hard to put together and keeps him in front of me when training. The only thing I would change would be designing the feeding/water bowls placing them higher, so feces do not drop into the bowls. Rio makes use of all parts of his gym.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Prevue Pet Products Small Parrot Playstand 3181 Black Hammertone, 17.625-Inch by 16-1/2-Inch by 59-Inch
product_meta.description: Prevue Pet Products Small Parrot Playstand includes 8 hooks for hanging multiple toys and treats, along with 3 ladders for plenty of space to climb. A swing is even included for more playing fun. Double cups provide room for food, water and treats, and the easy-rolling caster stand lets you easily move the playstand from room to room or indoors to outdoors. A pull-out drawer, along with the rounded corner seed guard, make cleaning quick and easy, while the bottom storage shelf is perfect for keeping extra food, treats, toys and cleaning supplies. Our Small Parrot Playstand is available in a non-toxic, powder-coated, black hammertone finish and measures 17-5/8-inch long, 16-1/2-inch wide and 59-inch high to the top of the toy hook.
feature_bullets: Quality and performance driven products for your pet
Provide a better quality of living for your pet with Prevue Pet

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
